Summary: Holding circle after incantation sets the spell to be used after an physical attack by releasing circle during it. 10/9/8/7 SP and 10/8/6/4 TP cost
Holding circle eliminates the time the mage is immobile after casting the spell. 40/36/32/28 SP cost
Holding circle after the spell restores 1/4 of the damage dealt. 50/48/46/44 SP cost
Holding circle after the spell restores 30% of SP. 15/14/13/12 TP cost
Holding circle after the spell restores 10% of TP. 80/78/76/74 SP cost
Holding circle after the spell restores 15% of other allies SP. 90/88/86/84 SP cost and 8/6/4/2 TP cost
Holding circle after hitting with the spell makes it easier to stun the enemy. 70/66/62/58 SP cost
Holding circle during the time the mage is immobile after casting the spell gives aproximatelly 1 second of I-frames, costs 40/36/32/28 SP
Holding circle right after starting to cast makes the cast time 1/4 of the original time. 100/97/94/91 SP cost and 24/22/20/18 TP cost
Holding circle executes an extension spell. 90/87/84/81 SP cost and 20/18/16/14 TP cost
Holding circle during Spirits Burst executes a Mystic Arte. (Can be used even by Nanaly and/or outside spirits burst with the ACC glitch or Spell extension glitch)
